content:
# LS2019

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/ls2019/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:40:12

The Main Library of the AGH University of Science and Technology
,
and  
UNESCO Chair for Science, Technology and Engineering Education at the AGH UST
invite to the seminar
LIBRARIES OF THE WORLD: PUBLICATIONS OR E-SOURCES.

Expectations and reality.
The seminar will take place on March 21, 2019.
Topics:
The use of library collections – tendencies and users’ expectations
The use of e-sources - research, scope, statistics
Open Access issues
Organization of access to e-sources and the acquisition of printed collections
All those interested in the above topics are encouraged to participate in the seminar and submit proposals of speeches and posters (in English) 
until March 8, 2019
.
Applications along with the completed 
registration form
 (file in docx format) and summaries of speeches, please send to Monika Szuman at 
szuman@bg.agh.edu.pl

For more details check Librarie's website 
[link]
Download programme in PDF file
Programe LS 2019 v06.pdf
